title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
about: A story-driven, open-world RPG set in a dark fantasy universe. You are Geralt of Rivia, mercenary monster slayer. You must find the Child of Prophecy, a living weapon that can alter the shape of the world.

keyFeatures.title: Monster Hunter
keyFeatures.description: Use a variety of tools, magic, and skills to track and defeat dangerous creatures.

keyFeatures.title: Moral Choices
keyFeatures.description: Decisions often come with difficult consequences that ripple throughout the narrative.

keyFeatures.title: A World to Explore
keyFeatures.description: Vast continents like Novigrad and Skellige offer hundreds of hours of exploration and side quests.

details.platforms: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch

systemSpecs.Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
systemSpecs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon R9 290
